thread.title: Hugh Grant expecting fourth child in four years
thread.title_full: Hugh Grant expecting fourth child in four years

title: Hugh Grant expecting fourth child in four years
text:
By Andrea Park CBS News October 13, 2015, 12:12 PM Hugh Grant expecting fourth child in four years 
Hugh Grant is expecting a fourth child. Theo Wargo/Getty Images 
Hugh Grant is expecting his fourth child in four years. At least he's not the one giving birth. 
Grant and girlfriend, Swedish TV producer Anna Eberstein, are having a second child together, reports ET. 
The actor has his own modern family with three children and another one on its way from two on-and-off relationships with ex Tinglan Hong and current girlfriend Eberstein. 
Here's the timeline: The 55-year-old actor had a daughter, Tabitha, from his relationship with Hong in 2011. A year later, he and Eberstein welcomed son John Mungo Grant. Grant got back together with Hong in 2013, and she gave birth to son Felix that same year. Apparently, Hong and Eberstein's pregnancies even overlapped at one point. 
Last September, when Grant and Eberstein were not together, he told a Swedish newspaper of the producer: "We are very good friends and she's a very good mother. [I see my son] all the time, all the time -- most days." 
When do we get to see "Four Kids and Counting"? Â© 2015 CBS Interactive Inc. All Rights Reserved. Shares
